summary: This document is a communication from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting proposed redactions to voir dire transcripts related to the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings and efforts to protect sensitive information.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, proposing redactions to voir dire transcripts in the Epstein case.

events.title: Proposal of Redactions to Voir Dire
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends proposed redactions to voir dire transcripts to counsel.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Proposed redactions to voir dire transcripts were submitted on November 20, 2021.
The communication originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings requiring the protection of sensitive information from public view.
